alert.note: Alert for Kendall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 10:40PM CDT until July 29 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR KENDALL COUNTY... At 1039 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elburn to near North Utica, moving east- southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Plainfield, Oswego, Yorkville, Minooka, Plano, Sandwich, Montgomery, Boulder Hill, Newark, Millington, Millbrook, Lisbon, Plattville, Bristol and Little Rock. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 120 and 122. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
